alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 11:29AM EDT until April 18 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. .Rainfall amounts of one to two inches across much of central Indiana yesterday will lead to lowland and minor flooding along the East Fork White at Seymour. The river should crest Saturday evening and fall back below flood Sunday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Lowland flood continues. County Road 700 E begins to flood. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
